programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Ep24
programme.desc: The Four Flamingos / The Roaring Rooster - Archibald eats too many beets and teams up with lumberjacks for a logging competition. Sage tries to earn all his Roaring Rooster badges in one day.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep24
programme.desc: Are You There Frank? It's Me, King Julien - Frank the Sky God comes to the lemur kingdom to prove his existence and to demand the ultimate sacrifice: King Julien himself.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep43
programme.desc: Lucky and the Escape Artist - Soon-to-be-big sister Lucky borrows Snips for a day to see what its like to have a little sibling, but nothing goes as planned

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep37
programme.desc: A Tale of Three Kiddies / Austland City Limits - In honor of #ThrowbackThursday, each Harvey Girl shares a story from her past. Gerald takes the gang to visit his hometown.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep37
programme.desc: The Day Mel Fell/Burns Ex Boo - Mel Shellman gets fired and crashes with the FAST crew, but he's so annoying they try to get him rehired; An old flame shows up, making Chet jealous.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep2
programme.desc: Delivery Disaster / Slippery Business - When Donna's delivery truck breaks down, it's up to the crew to help Donna continue delivering packages to Harmony Harbor's residents. / When the crew takes on a mission to rescue a lost pet, Ellie must face her fears in order to help save the day.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Ep24
programme.desc: The Four Flamingos / The Roaring Rooster - Archibald eats too many beets and teams up with lumberjacks for a logging competition. Sage tries to earn all his Roaring Rooster badges in one day.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep32
programme.desc: Scrap to the Future / Bringing Up Birdy - As shes preparing for the Hearts & Crafts Festival, Poppy finds a mysterious scrapbook that seems to predict the future and it shows the festival being a disaster! She and Branch set out to prevent the predictions from coming true. But is there a downside to being over prepared?/When a nest full of just-hatched baby birds imprint on Branch, he must overcome his fear of birds in order to raise them right.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep2
programme.desc: Colossal Strawberry/The Sappening - When Berry sees a "giant strawberry," she's convinced that the prophecy of the berry colossus has com e true and that she's been chosen to lead her people to their true calling. Rocksy, meanwhile, is devastated that her friend is leaving, unti she realizes the strawberry is actually a pinata and Berry is in danger! / Twig is afraid his sapping will put the Mighty Ones in peril, but Rocksy aims to show him that his sap can be used for good.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep45
programme.desc: Written By - When Dulcinea searches for clues on the Crown of Souls, she finds the author of the Wee Compendium book and holds him hostage until she gets answers

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep1
programme.desc: Scooter Buskie - The worlds worst baby is on the loose and Boss Baby, Tim and the team must find him before he turns the whole neighborhood against babies

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep2
programme.desc: Cat's in the Cradle - When an unexpected kitten shows up on Boss Babys doorstep, they go head to head against the feline enemy

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep63
programme.desc: Snuffnut - Tuff fakes his own death to make room for Throk, but when Ruff tries to train the Changewing that she thinks ate Tuff, a flock of angry Changewings come for the dragon

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep64
programme.desc: Searching For Oswald And Chicken - On a search for Dagur's dad, Hiccup and Dagur encounter vicious Grim Gnashers, and Tuff's search for a missing Chicken leads him to discover she has a second family

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep13
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Troublesome Treachery of the Thieving Toot Fairy - George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep14
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Tenuous Takedown of the Tyrannical Teachertrons - In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep15
programme.desc: Curse of the Monkey King - Po and the Kids take a shortcut to the boat bound for the Forbidden City, and are waylaid by a tricky monkey. Zhizhu informs Mayor Li of some distressing sounds coming from the Wellspring.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep16
programme.desc: A Game of Fists - When Po and eventually the kids finally make it on the Riverboat, they discover old friends, new enemies, and perplexing cargo.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep45
programme.desc: Written By - When Dulcinea searches for clues on the Crown of Souls, she finds the author of the Wee Compendium book and holds him hostage until she gets answers

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep21
programme.desc: Rupert and the Scarecrow - Rupert and the others meet a sad little scarecrow who's lonely and upset that the crows don't come near him.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep22
programme.desc: Rupert and the Octopus Garden - Ping Pong's magic accidentally brings a picture of an Octopus to life and the friends need to stop it causing chaos.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep23
programme.desc: Rupert and the Treasure Chest - An old Pirate tells Rupert he is searching for the treasure that will raise his sunken ship from the depths. How can Rupert help him?

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep24
programme.desc: Rupert and the Magic Show - When Ping Pong's glow-worm trick goes wrong, it's her rival Bill who ends up helping out with spectacular results.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep21
programme.desc: How Can We Make Music For Mimi? - Mimi has lost the handle to her music box and can't hear her music. Jess works out how to make instruments and get all the friends involved in making a little orchestra and performing a fantastic song to cheer mimi up.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep22
programme.desc: How Can We Find Sammy Snail? - Jess helps Mimi to find her little frend Sammy Snail who's gone missing. They check all the places she's seen him before and work out that if they follow the silvery train it leads right to him.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep23
programme.desc: Why Won't My Kite Fly? - Jess is given his very first kite by Mimi. It's very special indeed. He can't wait to fly it! But first he has to work out HOW!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep24
programme.desc: How Did A Dandelion Seed Get Into Mimi's Garden? - Mimi is shocked to find a dandelion plant in her lovely pink and purple garden. She didn't plant it there herself, so how on earth did the dandelion get there? Jess is determined to find out and in the process they work out how some seeds are transported by birds, some in the coats of animals and some in the wind. Jess says goodbye and asks the children to see how many different types of seeds and flowers they can spot.

programme.title: Olivia Ep39
programme.desc: Olivia Paints A Mural - Olivia is inspired after a visit to the museum with her family, and decides she's going to become a great painter herself. She gets right down to business, painting a portrait of Ian. When she sees a mural painting on a building wall, she wonders if she'll ever find a space big enough for her big ideas!

programme.title: Olivia Ep40
programme.desc: Olivia And Her Ducklings - After a fun day at the park, Olivia and Ian return home with some unexpected visitors a mother duck and her ducklings! The harder Olivia and Ian try to keep he ducks a secret from Mother and Father, the more household mischief they all seem to get into.

programme.title: Olivia Ep41
programme.desc: Olivia The Pet Monitor - Olivia and Francine both volunteer to be classroom pet monitor, so the teacher, Mrs. Hogenmuller, tells them each to explain why they deserve the job. Francine initially wins over the class with the help of her charming cat, Gwendolyn, but when it's revealed that Francine is afraid of the class lizard, everyone is happy for Olivia to take over the job - especially Francine!

programme.title: Olivia Ep42
programme.desc: Olivia Plays Hotel - When school is let out early due to snow, Julian and Francine come over to Olivia's house. Olivia has the perfect game for them Hotel! She transforms her house into a make-believe hotel. But then some strange things start to happen. Does the hotel have ghosts, or is Ian just playing tricks on them?

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep21
programme.desc: Why Rhino Charges - You see there was a time when Rhino didn't charge and he couldn't see very well at all. Poor old Rhino really wanted to be invited to the Dance of the Horns up on the plains with Buffalo and all the other horned animals. But Rhino didn't have a horn, so he wasn't allowed. The Monkeys decide to help Rhino and make him a horn from a piece of old wood. But when Rhino wakes up he doesn't know what it is. Aargh! Thing on the end of my nose! CHAAaarge!' And that's Why Rhino Charges. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep22
programme.desc: Why Caterpillar Is Never In A Hurry - You see Caterpillar was never in a hurry. When all the animals were racing around Tinga Tinga getting ready for the Best-dressed parade, Caterpillar was happy to sit in a tree and munch on leaves saying Po-le, po-le, slowly, slowly, good things come to those who wait'. Then one day the rains come and Caterpillar disappears into a cocoon. What's happening?' questions Elephant. Wait and see' says Tortoise wisely Wait and See'. Then Caterpillar transforms into the most beautiful butterfly ever!... But who wins the Best-dressed parade? Tales from Africa

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep23
programme.desc: Why Lion Roars - You see there was a time when Lion had lost his roar. Crocodile was snapping at all the animals in the Waterhole and Lion opened his big mouth but nothing came out! Tiny Flea tells Lion that if he dares to enter the Great Cave of Tinga Tinga then maybe he will find his roar. Lion plucks up courage and goes into the Great Cave. He roars with all his might, but a bigger roar comes back! Lion stands strong. He roars again and an even bigger roar comes back. Lion's very own Echo! He has found his roar! From that day on Lion always roars with pride, showing any beast who's the real King of Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep24
programme.desc: Why Zebra Has Stripes - Zebra was once very easy to spot in Tinga Tinga as he was bright white all over. This very annoying as all he wanted was to be left alone to munch on yummy grass and get fat. One day, Eagle arrives at the Watering Hole with a new pair of sharp talons saying that she found them in the Great Cave. The animals excitedly rush to find something for themselves. Zebra accompanies Tortoise and the Monkeys into the Cave where they discover the last remaining item; a plain black coat. The Monkeys persuade Zebra to try it on. By holding in his stomach, Zebra manages to get the coat on but it is extremely tight and the black coat starts to rip. In fact, the more Zebra eats the more the coat rips until Zebra has a stripy black and white coat which he is extremely proud of. Not only that, his new stripes make him very difficult to spot amongst the tall grasses of the plains. Finally, Zebra can eat as much grass as he likes and not be spotted by the other animals!

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep25
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part I - In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep26
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part II - Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants brain and defeat the nanobots leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants brain cells to the rescue! And when its all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep12
programme.desc: Hang in There, Baby - When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep13
programme.desc: Six Well-Placed Kittens - When Bootsy's plan of 6 strategically placed kittens brings the whole town down, Mega Fat is forced to team with Boss Baby

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep3
programme.desc: The Lotus - Po's moral lines are blurred when he and Blade have to break an untrustworthy hedgehog monk (Zhen) out of jail to get more information on what Klaus and Veruca stole from the Lotus. They learn from Zhen that there are in fact three more weapons, and Po recognizes one of them from a comic book.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep12
programme.desc: The Party Games / Trolly Tales - Everyone gets excited because its time for the Trolls Annual funbased Party GamesPoppy and Branch try to convince the Troll kids that the library is fun.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep77
programme.desc: The Moving Finger Writes - Puss and the gang attempt to find Sino for help to stop the earthquakes and end up on a dangerous journey to The Forbidden Citadel

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep26
programme.desc: Dawn Of The Broods Part 1 & Part 2 - Grug convinces The Croods to go on vacation, and they find a new family, The Broods, who live in a solitary utopia too good to be true/The Croods must escape and warn Ahhh! Valley before it's too late.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep12
programme.desc: Venice the Menace - The Wanderers head to Venice to get a new cookie jar from Venice. Odlulu aims to become belle of the ball at the Venice Carnival but when she gets hold of the Crystal Glass Key, she turns the canals of Venice to glass. The Wanderers must get the key back and restore the city to normal.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep23
programme.desc: New Hat, New Tag! / Furry Tail Ending - When Tag worries that she's no longer a "Go" dog, Lady Lydia helps her find a new persona by helping Tag try on a bunch of different hats. Luckily, when a runaway puppy needs to be wrangled, and only the speedy Tag can catch him, Tag realizes she was a Go dog all along. \ Sergeant Pooch reads Scooch, Tag and Kit a story book during their sleepover. But when the last pages are missing, the three kids work together to make up their own ending to the story.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep3
programme.desc: You (Don't) Snooze, You Lose / Save The Squasher - When the crew takes on a mission to help Ian get some rest for a Badminton Tournament, Jax realises that the biggest approach isn't always the best approach. / When Lula loses her comic book, Ari learns that the best heroes rely on teamwork and not gadgets.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep23
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Winter Games - The children are excited as there's a big Winter Snowdown on the fells. There's a snowman building competition, followed by a race down the snowy hill! Pat's Special Delivery is a consignment of deflated inner tubes for them to slide on, but the 4x4 hits an icy patch and slips into a ditch - and when Ted tries to rescue him, his truck gets stuck as well! On the fells competition is rife - not between the children, but with Ajay and Amy! Everyone is keen for the race to begin - but where is Pat with the inner tubes? Thanks to some cheeky sheep playing follow the leader' with Jess, Pat has an idea. He and Ted pump up two of the inner tubes and Jess and the sheep pull them like huskies to the fells with the rest of the Special Delivery! Pat zooms in and saves the day - and everyone enjoys the race, including two very cheeky sheep!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep24
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Bucking Bronco - Hopes are high for this evening's hoe-down on Greendale's village green - especially among PC Selby and Ted, who each harbour hopes of dancing with Dr Gilbertson. Pat's mission is to deliver one of Ted's inventions, a mechanical horse or bucking bronco, to the event. But when the bronco is accidentally switched on in the back of Pat's van, it rolls away and Pat can't find a way to recapture it. He enlists Amy's help, but jealous Pumpkin pushes the bronco away, making matters worse. Meanwhile PC Selby and Ted are each determined to be the best banjo-playing dancers Greendale (or more specifically, Dr Gilbertson) has ever seen Pat has a great idea to catch the escaped bronco, using Dr Gilbertson's lasso-throwing skills. As Pat drives her sports car, Dr G throws the lasso - and captures the mechanical horse just in time. As she does a celebratory dance with both PC Selby and Ted, Pat is the toast of the hoe-down. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep25
programme.desc: Belly Flop - The Riders have to save Elbone when he's swallowed by a giant Sea Gronckle, and Dak's awful cooking might be just the thing to do it.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Ep25

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep3
programme.desc: Wad of Friendship/Twig Puts Down Roots - Berry and Rocksy are thrilled about spending every waking moment together when they get stuck to the same piece of gum, but as more people join their gum ball, things spiral out of control. \ When Twig begins to root, he thinks his dreams of becoming a Mighty Oak Tree are finally coming true! But as the Mighty Ones observe his "roots" growing in a weird and gross manner, they try to convince Twig that maybe things aren't what they seem.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep66

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep15
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Frantic Fury of the Fearsome Furculees - Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep16
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep17
programme.desc: The Beast of the Wasteland - Po and the Kids are once more waylaid, this time by Mole Rats who have deemed Bao their god. But when Bao isn't able to defeat the mythical creature plaguing the Wasteland, Fan Tong steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep25
programme.desc: Rupert and the Missing Music - Rupert asks Ping Pong to do some magic to make their band instruments play better but the spell goes wrong. The colourful musical notes fly away, leaving them with instruments that make no sound.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep26
programme.desc: Rupert and the Weather Machine - When it starts raining sausages in Nutwood Rupert and friends fly up to the Cloud Shepherd's home to find out what has happened to the weather machine.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep27
programme.desc: Rupert and the Hilarious Hiccups - Rupert, Bill, Freddy and Freda are playing in the forest when Freddy and Freda spot a colourful box dropped by a travelling salesman. They open it expecting to find sandwiches or even a cake but get more than they expected when hiccups jump out of the box instead. They try to run away from the hiccups but crash into the travelling salesman and his colourful cart and upset a box of yawns and a box of giggling noises too. Rupert, Bill, Freddy and Freda discover that the noises are very infectious and come up with a plan to help the travelling salesman capture the naughty noises again. Greedy Freddy and Freda still haven't learnt their lesson. They find the remainder of the Elf's lunch and guzzle it all up only to catch the hiccups for real and learn that they need to be less greedy in future.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep28
programme.desc: Rupert and the Snowglobe - When Rupert, Bill and Ping-Pong arrive at the beach one sunny day they are amazed to find a small snowstorm raging over one distinct area. Jack Frost emerges and explains that he has come early this year because he wants to catch some sun. He shows them the snowglobe he uses to control the icy storm. The friends play in the snow unaware that Ming has got hold of the snowglobe and is shaking it up, causing the storm to grow out of control....

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep25
programme.desc: What's The Grumbly Rumbly Noise? - Jess sets out to re-assure his frightened friends by working out what the noise is in the sky that's so loud.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep26
programme.desc: When Will The Snow Come? - Jess is hoping that soon it will snow so that they can make snow kittens and play in the snow like they did last year. First though he has to work out what the weather would have to be like for the snow to come..

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep19
programme.desc: Rainbow's Niece - Sarah's new colour wheel reminds Rainbow that he has not seen his niece in a while.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep18
programme.desc: Duck's Quack - Sarah suggests visiting the spare sounds section of the Big Shop when Duck loses his quack.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep4
programme.desc: New River - It hasn't rained in ages, Nelly and Nora find a thirsty flower that needs water.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Dog Loves Undersea Adventures - Dog and Pug join Granny Pug in search of the Lesser-Spotted Kraken.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep30
programme.desc: The Queen - Monty wonders whether the Queen has perfect manners all the time, or whether even royalty slip up now and then.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep4
programme.desc: It's time for a spring clear out - JoJo and Gran Gran are having a spring clear out, but when Gran Gran wants to clear out her old jumper, JoJo is distraught - she loves that snuggly jumper!

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep69
programme.desc: Dream House - The Blockers have built a house with a very peculiar quirk! Can Team Tinpo help a Po create his dream house?

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep68
programme.desc: Ramping Up - Uni-Boarder Jo has outgrown Tinpotown's Skate Park... but she doesn't want to stop the less experienced Kid Po from getting their practice!

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Camping - While on a camping holiday, Bluey makes a new friend named called Jean-Luc. Bluey may not understand him, but they find a common language playing and hunting for a wild Daddy pig.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep40
programme.desc: The Football Badge - After deciding to play football, Duggee starts the game by kicking the ball to the squirrels - who look at it blankly as they do not know what to do.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep39
programme.desc: The Sandcastle Badge - The squirrels learn how to make sandcastles on the beach, and their work turns out to be so impressive that two crabs ask the gang to build them a new home.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep38
programme.desc: The Caterpillar Badge - The squirrels are helping Duggee in the garden when Tag makes friends with a caterpillar. She is very hungry, so Tag feeds her the vegetable leaves they have been picking.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep34
programme.desc: The Parthenon, Greece - Inspired by his favourite action film, Grand Master Glitch plans to make a blockbuster of his own, but first he needs to find the right setting for an action adventure.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep33
programme.desc: Easter Island, Chile - Grandmaster Glitch is on holiday to the remote Easter Island to avoid crowds, but when he arrives he finds droves of tourists everywhere!

programme.title: The Numtums S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Koala On The Loose - Champer waits for his new action figure to arrive, but there is a mix-up and he receives a Fluffy McTuffy action figure instead.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Join In - The Teletubbies have their favourite things and The Noo-Noo wants to join in. When the Tubby Phone rings, the Teletubbies and The Noo-Noo do the Tubby Phone Dance together.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Peas - Dee encourages a friend to say peas and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep24
programme.desc: The Floor is Bananas - Helping Hand builds a banana-themed obstacle course. But when Phoebe becomes competitive, she must work with her team to make it over the finish line together.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep29
programme.desc: Colours - Messy and friends are left feeling blue when the vacubots suck all the colour out of OKIDO!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep32
programme.desc: Wild Thing - Monty and Jimmy Jones think it would be exciting to have a pet lion and wonder why you can't keep wild animals at home.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep44
programme.desc: Handstand - At a party, Bingo is desperate to show off her handstand skills, while Nanna can't find a way to make herself useful. They're both feeling a bit lost, until they find each other.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep46
programme.desc: The Bubble Badge - The dog blows a lot of bubbles with his pot of bubble mixture. Though it is quite hard to do, most of the squirrels eventually get the hang of it and the clubhouse fills up with lots of bubbles.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep45
programme.desc: The First Aid Badge - The squirrels are playing Copy the King when Tag falls over and bumps his knee. Luckily, Duggee has his First Aid badge, so he can bandage Tag up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep44
programme.desc: The Be Careful Badge - When Naughty Monkey starts throwing bananas down from his branch, Ethel slips and the squirrels investigate.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep39
programme.desc: The Great Barrier Reef, Australia - The team dives into action as Glitch's treasure hunt endangers the Great Barrier Reef.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep38
programme.desc: Caernarfon Castle, Wales - How will the Go Jetters retrieve Xuli's treasured 'Academy Ace' flying trophy from Caernarfon Castle?

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep43
programme.desc: Duck Cake - Bluey wants to help Dad make Bingo's birthday cake, but first she must put away her toys. But nothing can tempt her to clean up, until Dad drops the cake.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep42
programme.desc: Muffin Cone - When Muffin can't stop sucking her thumb, she has to wear a cone of shame. But the cone gets in her way and she can no longer play `sandwich shop' with Bluey and Bingo.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Andy and the Hermit Crab - Andy heads to a Caribbean island to track down some hermit crabs and their shells.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Flying Machines - Grace first goes wingwalking, then shows off the incredible harrier jump jet before flying a gyroplane!

programme.title: Swashbuckle S6 Ep22
programme.desc: The Only Way Is Pirate - Ahoy there! A team of daring young swashbucklers battle naughty pirates and a stern Captain to win jewels for their treasure chest. Cook and Line are auditioning for a TV programme!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep43
programme.desc: The Big Parade Badge - Duggee and the squirrels help out when the leader of the Big Parade hurts his leg.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Fast Feud / Never Friending Story - Ronnie Anne and Sid try to take down the obnoxious burger restaurant that opened up across the street. // After picking Par as his new best friend, Bobby realizes he may be in over his head.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Grandparent Trap / Miss Step - Ronnie Anne thinks her grandparent's marriage is in trouble after watching a relationship talk show. // Ronnie Anne learns the art of baile folklorico - and that her Tia Frida is one intense instructor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Slink or Swim / The Big Chill - When Bobby finds out Carl can't swim, he offers to show him the ways of the waves! // After begging Abuelo for some A/C, the cousins decide to earn some cash at the neighborhood fair.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Karma Chameleon / Team Effort - The Changs go on vacation, leaving Ronnie Anne and her cousins to look after Cam, the chameleon snake. // Ronnie Anne and her skate buddies work together to show their coach they can make a good team.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Backpay Payback - Granny Tentacles helps Squidward collect his paper delivery money from Cecil.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep116
programme.desc: House Hunting - The Star family house runs away from home.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep248
programme.desc: Squid's on a Bus - Squidward gleefully switches jobs with a bus driver for an easy ride... until SpongeBob and Patrick climb aboard.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep146
programme.desc: The Abrasive Side / Earworm - SpongeBob can never say "no" to anyone, so he orders a product called the "abrasive side". // SpongeBob gets a song stuck in his head.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Helter Shelter / Reveille Revolution - SpongeBob, Sandy, and Patrick are split up into separate cabins. // Squidward has to earn back his morning 'Reveille' duties.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Switch Glitch / Prickly Pests - An accident causes Patrick and Karen to switch bodies. // A mischievous camp prank goes terribly wrong.

programme.title: The Loud House S07 Ep704
programme.desc: Bye, Bye, Birthday / Tough Guise - Tired of the yearly cheer surrounding her birthday, Lucy casts a spell so her family will forget what day it is. // When Zach is given detention, Rusty and the rest of their friends try to toughen up him up so he'll fit in.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Friended! with the Casagrandes - Ronnie Anne makes friends with Sid, a girl whose family wants to rent the apartment upstairs. When it looks like another couple might get it first, the girls resort to sabotage to try and dissuade them.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Age of Evolution Pt. 2 - With the birth of three new Terrans (hashtag, Nightshade, and Jawbreaker), the Malto family has grown. But will these new allies be enough to rescue Dot and Megatron from the clutches of Mandroid?

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Squidina's Little Helper / I Smell a Pat - The Patrick Star Show is interrupted by a most peculiar stench. // Squidina hires an assistant who's a little too good at his job.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep259
programme.desc: The Ghost of Plankton / My Two Krabses - Plankton becomes a ghost to steal the secret formula, but requires a few lessons from the Flying Dutchman. // Mr. Krabs gets ready for a hot date, but SpongeBob and Patrick give him a little more help than he needs.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep239
programme.desc: The Grill is Gone - When a gang of kids steals the Krusty Krab's grill, SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs go to extreme lengths to win it back.

programme.title: Monster High S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Monstering - Human girl, Clawdeen, follows her instincts and discovers Monster High!/When Clawdeen isn't allowed into Monster High because she's human, she devises other ways to get into school

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep207
programme.desc: An Udder Mess - Ronnie Anne wins two tickets to Dairyland - but has to choose between her besties Sid and Lincoln for the day!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep208
programme.desc: I, Breakfast Bot / Dynamic Do-Over - Ronnie Anne and her cousins hatch a plan to have Sid's Breakfast Bot do their chores - ALL of them! // When Carl's dreams are crushed after meeting El Falcon, Bobby decides to take on the role himself!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Home Improvement / Undivided Attention - Laird is nervous to host movie night at his house, so Ronnie Anne helps him pretend Arturo's pad is his own! // Carlota can't seem to pay attention to anything but her phone, so Carlos sets her up - with a math tutor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Karate Chops / Taco The Town - Used to being top dog, Carl can't handle when Adelaide joins his karate class and becomes the star student. // Hector starts selling Rosa's delicious tacos but gets overwhelmed when they're more popular than the mercado!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep216
programme.desc: Cave Dwelling Sponge / The Clam Whisperer - When a prehistoric Sponge is unfrozen, he causes chaos all over town - and only SpongeBob can communicate with him! // When a flock of clams descend on Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob has to get them out before they ruin the whole town!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep217
programme.desc: Spot Returns / The Check-Up - When his pet amoeba Spot has puppies, Plankton decides to use them in another of his nefarious plots. // Mr. Krabs is too scared to get his physical, but if he doesn't pass, the Krusty Krab will be shut down!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep218
programme.desc: Spin the Bottle / There's a Sponge in My Soup - Plankton poses as a wish-granting genie in his latest scheme to get the secret formula. // Mr. Krabs' new Krabby soup is a hit - until some heat-loving hippies move into the soup vat!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep219
programme.desc: Man Ray Returns / Larry the Floor Manager - When Man Ray rents Squidward's house for the weekend, it's up to SpongeBob and Patrick to stop his evil vacation! // Mr. Krabs takes a vacation and makes Larry the Lobster the temporary manager of the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Squidina's Little Helper / I Smell a Pat - The Patrick Star Show is interrupted by a most peculiar stench. // Squidina hires an assistant who's a little too good at his job.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Squidina's Little Helper - The Patrick Star Show is interrupted by a most peculiar stench.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Qilin Time - Po is embarrassed when his dad takes him on a wild goose chase, but it turns out his dad is not so crazy afterall.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep211
programme.desc: A Tigress Tale - When Master Mugan from the Garnet Palace desides she needs a new Kung Fu Master, Tigress volunteers. Will the Furious Five be minus one or will Po convince Tigress to return to the Jade Palace?

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep114
programme.desc: The Fortuneteller - Aang, Katara, and Sokka discover a village of people who are all reliant on a fortuneteller in their everyday lives but they are so reliant that they are blind to the immanent danger they are all in.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Littlefoot - Marlene is dying to go see a concert in the park. But, every time she leaves the zoo she becomes a feral monster!

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep314
programme.desc: The Penguin Who Loved Me - When Doris the Dolphin shows up with Parker the Platypus and asks a favor of Kowalski, he instantly jumps to her rescue only to find out its to free her brother Francis who happens to be a mind-jacked Dr. Blowhole.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Side Hustle / Burt Speaks - Parker picks up a bunch of side hustles in order to afford the perfect gift for Angus. // Parker believes Burt can speak via popping bubble wrap, and pretty soon, the whole mountain seeks Burt's wisdom.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Robot Arms / PB & J - Buhdeuce gets robot arms to help him mine bread, but he ends up having to use them to help everyone else out instead. // The guys adopt a Ponda Bear, who seems like a cute, sweet pet... but he's actually quite the opposite.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Ice Ice Baby - After getting caught in a snowstorm, Evan accidentally damages the snow ogre meant to protect local villagers and is made to stand trial for his crime.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Unblocking Bernie / Photo Finished - Bernie develops writers block while trying to draw the next chapter of his comic book, Niceness Guy. // Hoping to finally get a good school photo, Ollie summons Nosphotoratu from the pack to take his picture.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Cloak and Swaggart / Jupiter Jim Ahoy! - April and Sunita search New York for Sunita's stolen cloaking brooch. // The Turtles meet their favorite sci-fi movie star, Jupiter Jim!

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Shirts Off / Middle Shame - Sanjay and Craig realize that only by taking off their shirts can they experience the ecstasy of total freedom. // Craig helps Sanjay overcome his fear of embarrassment and reveal his goofy middle name.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Dorg and the Xmas Fairy / Dorg versus Dorg - When Patronella brings a tree ornament to life that hates Christmas, it's up to Dorg and the Magicals to stop the fairy from ruining Christmas! // Patronella brings Dorg's reflection to life to do chores.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Excuse Me / Night Morning - Fanboy, Chum Chum and Kyle are late for school, but they manage to get Kyle's Elf to write them an excuse note, and it works. // Fanboy learns that Chum Chum has discovered a new part of the day called Night Morning.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep117
programme.desc: The Rat Pack / Booby Trap - When Keswick's cloning machine ends up in the wrong hands, Petropolis is overrun by Snaptraps! // Bird Brain's discovers that he is the last blue-bottomed booby in Petropolis and thus T.U.F.F. is not allowed to touch him at all.

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep605
programme.desc: The Golden Auditorium - Aisha and Stella work together as the Winx defeat the Treants, and earn their new Bloomix Power. Later, the Winx and Daphne tour the Golden Auditorium where they come face to face with a group of not-so-melodic sprites!

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep606
programme.desc: Vortex of Flames - Everyone celebrates Daphne's coronation on Domino, but Bloom is weak from sharing her Dragon Flame. With help from Diaspro, the Trix and Selina send Fire Eaters to attack Bloom. Will she find the power within herself to triumph?

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Loch Mess Monster / Might Meow and Super Lucha - Miguel is so messy that a creature named the Loch Mess Monster moves in with him. // Felicity and Miguel pretend to be real super heroes, drawing the wrath of a notorious super villain named The Couch Potato.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep236
programme.desc: Call the Cops! / Surf N' Turf - Plankton goes to jail, but the secret formula is taken as evidence! SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs plot to get it back. // Sandy struggles to build a ship-in-a-bottle before a big contest, so SpongeBob calls in a little extra help.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep238
programme.desc: Appointment TV / Karen's Virus - The long-lost episode of Mermaid Man is finally showing on TV, but will SpongeBob make it home in time to watch? // Karen gets a computer virus, and it's up to SpongeBob to get it out of her!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep239
programme.desc: The Grill is Gone / The Night Patty - When a gang of kids steals the Krusty Krab's grill, SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs go to extreme lengths to win it back. // SpongeBob helps out the Krusty Krab's night shift crew, but the customers crave something creepier than usual.

programme.title: Secrets Of Our Cities - Gold Coast Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - This cityscape of bright lights and high rises, the Gold Coast hides a past of bitter struggle and huge enterprise. Greig Pickhaver reveals how South Sea Islanders and post war migration led to it's constant reinvetion.

programme.title: Planet America Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - With only a year until the 2024 election, it's shaping as a rematch of the 2020 race. Or will history intervene? Republican candidates look to make their mark as a Trump VP nominee or the GOP's backup plan at the 3rd Debate.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep42
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes bring you a weekly hit of Pacific joy as they share inspiring stories of athletes with Pacific Island heritage. We profile aspiring athletes as they prepare for the 2023 Pacific Games.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep199
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The daily destination for #auspol addicts. Greg Jennett comes to you from Parliament House with the latest news in politics and national affairs, plus interviews with key players on the issues and events making headlines.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep219
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: The Drum Ep204
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a panel led by Julia Baird, Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier and Kathryn Robinson.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep219
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep172
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep219
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - More news, more often: the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. The ABC's network of reporters uncover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: The Business Ep160
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Australia's leading daily business and finance show brings you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, investors, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Alicia Barry.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep219
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Stay in touch with the latest breaking news and comprehensive coverage of the day's top stories. With reporters in more places, ABC News connects communities and tells the stories that matter to you. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: Built To Survive - Wet and Wild Rainforests Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - In the heat and humidity of the rainforest Phil reveals the survival adaptations of the elusive tree kangaroo, the colourful cassowary and the lethal scrub python.

programme.title: The World Ep219
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Know what's going on in our world. Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Kitchen Cabinet - Dai Le Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 7 - Independent Dai Le tells Annabel Crabb how she survived war, cancer and pirates on her way to becoming a Western Sydney politician. On the menu, a crispy Vietnamese pancake, banh xeo.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep28
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The power of the personal. Compelling stories about real people that illuminate, entertain and inspire. Presented by Leigh Sales.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep172
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep219
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Follow the story with the latest on the day's events, explaining what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe uncovering what you need to know. Presented by Jade Barker.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Forest - Forest Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - While forests only cover 16% of Australia's land area, they harbour a higher concentration of animal species than anywhere else on the continent. (Final)

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep28
programme.desc: Sr. 34 - Josh learns how gardens heal us, Costa gets paving, Sophie creates home floristry, Clarence tours a habitat corridor, Hannah gardens on clay soil, plus we meet African communities uniting through growing food.

programme.title: News Breakfast Ep220
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Be the first to know the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the top stories this morning. Michael Rowland and Lisa Millar bring you news and interviews, joined by Tony Armstrong, Madeleine Morris and Nate Byrne.

programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - When big stories break, turn to Karina Carvalho in the mornings to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep29
programme.desc: Sr. 34 - Jane visits a community restoring storm affected plots, Costa tours a heritage-listed garden, Tammy plants up a bromeliad basket, Jerry lifts the lid on compost critters, plus we meet a home gardener producing food for chefs.

programme.desc: Sr. 1 - It's the start of a busy year at the Sydney Opera House as the Australian ballet returns. While a whirlwind of romance hits the house with 28 Valentine's Day weddings, disaster strikes and Vivid LIVE faces a washout.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep200
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Matthew Doran brings you all the very latest news and interviews on what's going on in the halls of Parliament House in Canberra and the topics and events making headlines from coast to coast in politics and national affairs.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep220
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: The Drum Ep205
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a panel led by Julia Baird, Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier and Kathryn Robinson.

programme.title: ABC News Ep220
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: Secrets Of Our Cities - Footscray Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - One of the fastest settlements to develop, Footscray hasn't looked back. Once the industrial heart of Melbourne, it drew a European workforce from around the country and became known for it's strong sense of community.

programme.title: Kitchen Cabinet - Karen Andrews Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 7 - Former Home Affairs Minister and Liberal MP Karen Andrews has announced she will resign at the next election and in this candid interview she describes why Parliament House is the most sexist environment she's ever worked in.

programme.title: Planet America: Fireside Chat Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - One year out from the 2024 election, Chas and John look at the state of the nation and the polls. Plus the countdown to the 3rd Republican Primary Debate in Miami as GOP candidates fight for 2nd spot behind frontrunner Trump.

programme.title: If You're Listening - India or Bharat? Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - India might be getting a very old, new name. The story of how and why, reflects the history and traditions of a country defined by colonial boundaries and the caste system, while transforming into a potential superpower.

programme.title: The World Ep220
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep42
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Beverley O'Connor brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: Built To Survive - Wet and Wild Rainforests Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - In the heat and humidity of the rainforest Phil reveals the survival adaptations of the elusive tree kangaroo, the colourful cassowary and the lethal scrub python.

programme.title: Aussie Bull Catchers Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Liz and Willie have just one day to catch the remaining 16 bulls they need to fill their order. After 4 weeks without work, Clarry is desperate to find a bull catching contract. Lach's teammate, Scanner, is horned by a bull.

programme.title: The Truth About Menopause With Myf Warhurst
programme.desc: Myf Warhurst is on the cusp of a big change: the change. She wants to know what's in store. Myf asks what is menopause, what are the symptoms, what can she do about it, and is hormone therapy safe?

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep220
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Follow the story with the latest on the day's events, explaining what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe uncovering what you need to know. Presented by Jade Barker.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep40
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Are we headed for a Melbourne Cup Day interest rate rise? After 12 rate rises, the RBA paused rates but inflation has ticked higher again and market analysts now predict another rise before Christmas could be on the cards.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep42
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes bring you a weekly hit of Pacific joy as they share inspiring stories of athletes with Pacific Island heritage. We profile aspiring athletes as they prepare for the 2023 Pacific Games.

programme.title: The World Ep220
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep42

programme.title: The Drum Ep205
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a panel led by Julia Baird, Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier and Kathryn Robinson.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep29
programme.desc: Sr. 34 - Jane visits a community restoring storm affected plots, Costa tours a heritage-listed garden, Tammy plants up a bromeliad basket, Jerry lifts the lid on compost critters, plus we meet a home gardener producing food for chefs.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep42
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes bring you a weekly hit of Pacific joy as they share inspiring stories of athletes with Pacific Island heritage. We profile aspiring athletes as they prepare for the 2023 Pacific Games.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch Ep39
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Join Michael Rowland, Lisa Millar, Tony Armstrong, Madeleine Morris and Nate Byrne for some of the best conversations as we hear from some of the most informed and entertaining guests who have appeared on News Breakfast.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast Ep44
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Start your weekend informed and up-to-date. Fauziah Ibrahim and Kathryn Robinson bring you the latest news, interviews, politics, culture, weather and global affairs. Plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Heywire - Ceobahn from Renmark, SA Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Heywire winner Ceobahn has always felt a deep connection with the outback. Now she's part of a team of Indigenous rangers and ecologists managing land at Calperum Station.

programme.title: ABC News Ep88
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch throughout the day with ABC News. We bring you the headlines and latest on the day's top stories, plus breaking news and live reports from the scene as events unfold.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep42
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Beverley O'Connor brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep88
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep40
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: AFLW - Round 10 - Western Bulldogs v North Melbourne Tasmania Ep46
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Round 10 is the final round of the AFLW regular season and also Pride Round. The Western Bulldogs host the North Melbourne Tasmanian Kangaroos at Whitten Oval.

programme.title: AFLW - Round 10 - Port Adelaide v GWS Giants Ep47
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The last round of the AFLW season before the Finals begin is also Pride Round. The Port Adelaide Power host the GWS Giants at Alberton Oval in SA.

programme.title: AFLW - Round 10 - Geelong v Hawthorn Ep48
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Round 10 is the final round of the AFLW regular season and also Pride Round. The Geelong Cats host the Hawthorn Hawks, with Finals spots on the line.

programme.title: Aussie Bull Catchers Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - After 6 weeks without work Clarry resorts to mustering his cyclone ravaged property. A new processing facility is set to open in the Northern Territory. The Cooks decide to take a gamble and begin catching feral buffalo.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - Carrickalinga Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 10 - Catherine and Mick found love later in life. After both confronting health issues, they realised there was no time like the present to build their dream home atop the spectacular hills of South Australia's Fleurieu Peninsula.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep31
programme.desc: Sr. 34 - Costa meets farmers fighting food waste, Josh tours a garden built on a spring, Tammy profiles Gesneriad plants, Hannah visits a haskap berry farm, Jerry has frugal garden tips, and we meet a student with a botanical bedroom.

programme.title: Inside The Sydney Opera House - It'll be Alright on the Night Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - It's the final countdown to the re-opening of the Concert Hall following a $150 million rebuild. After two and a half years, this is when CEO Louise Herron and the world will know if it has worked. (Final)

programme.title: The Dark Side Of The Universe
programme.desc: We live in a spectacular world. And yet everything we have ever seen, felt, or touched adds up to just five per cent of everything there is. Prof Tamara Davis meets scientists leading the hunt for the dark universe.

programme.title: Four Corners Ep40
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The longest running show on Australian TV, this award-winning current affairs documentary series is a powerhouse of investigative journalism - fearless and forensic, holding power to account through six decades and counting.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep28
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The power of the personal. Compelling stories about real people that illuminate, entertain and inspire. Presented by Leigh Sales.

programme.title: Kitchen Cabinet - Karen Andrews Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 7 - Former Home Affairs Minister and Liberal MP Karen Andrews has announced she will resign at the next election and in this candid interview she describes why Parliament House is the most sexist environment she's ever worked in.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep88
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep39
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Everybody loves it until they're on it! Australia's leading forum for media analysis and comment, bringing you a fearless critique of the week's journalism, issues and events in the news. Presented by Paul Barry.

programme.title: To The Stars: 100 Years Of The RAAF
programme.desc: 2021 marked the 100th anniversary of the Royal Australian Air Force. A look at the RAAF's illustrious history, through rare archival footage and interviews with air force veterans, servicing members and new recruits.

programme.title: UFC 293: Adesanya vs. Strickland
programme.desc: Main Event - Back to fight down under for the first time since 2019, UFC middleweight champion Israel Adesanya will pack Quodos Bank Arena in Sydney, Australia, when he defends his crown against hungry challenger Sean Strickland in the main event of UFC 293. After regaining his title with a satisfying knockout of Alex Pereira in April, New Zealands Adesanya now sets his sights on Strickland, who has won eight of his last ten bouts on the way to the biggest fight of his career. Plus, the pride of Western Australia returns, as heavyweight knockout artist Tai Tuivasa collides with Alexander Volkov.

programme.title: UFC 294: Makhachev vs. Volkanovski 2
programme.desc: Prelims - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. In February, the pair met for the first time, engaging in a Fight of the Year candidate that left fans demanding a rematch. Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds
